content:
From: Aaron Gray <aaronngray.lists@gmail.com>
Hi,

Has/does anyone know of a proof and/or inference rules for the 1997
Definition of Standard ML ?

Many thanks in advance,

Aaron

From: Ramana Kumar <rk436@cam.ac.uk>
There is the "Mechanized Definition" at the second item here
https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~crary/papers/

From: Aaron Gray <aaronngray.lists@gmail.com>
Thanks, that's twelth/elf which is really out of use now as far as I know.
But great thanks it looks quite large and extensive !

Regards,

Aaron
